blocks.headline: Boost your SEO with TinaCMS.
blocks.text: Unlock the full potential of your SEO efforts with the flexibility and control provided by TinaCMS.

blocks.content:
## Supercharge Your SEO with TinaCMS

With TinaCMS, you're in control. Configure any of your SEO fields as you like, and leverage the power of a headless CMS to create lightning-fast, SEO-optimized websites.

items.headline: Complete SEO Control
items.text: Configure your SEO fields as per your strategy and requirements. You have full control.

items.headline: Speed is Key
items.text: TinaCMS empowers you to create ultra-fast websites, a critical factor in SEO ranking.

items.headline: Lighthouse Champion
items.text: Achieve 100 Lighthouse scores with sites built using TinaCMS, further boosting your SEO.

items.headline: Open Source Frontend
items.text: TinaCMS's frontend codebase is open-source, backed by a vibrant community and regular updates.

items.headline: SSR & Static Support
items.text: Supports both Server Side Rendered and Static websites, providing flexibility in your SEO strategy.

items.headline: Headless CMS
items.text: Being a headless CMS, TinaCMS provides more flexibility and speed, leading to better SEO performance.

seo.title: Supercharge Your SEO with TinaCMS
seo.description: Unlock your SEO potential with the flexibility and control provided by TinaCMS. Configure your SEO fields as you like, and create fast, SEO-optimized websites.
